snippet.title: The Lotus Holidays: Official Game Trailer
snippet.description:
A stylish single player story-based game, where you win a free weekend at the "Lotus", a luxurious spa resort.
But soon, things take a strange and sinister turn.

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1962590
